resources.name: Bane of the powerful
primary: Gain 20% increased damage for 30.0 seconds after killing an elite pack.
secondary: Increases damage against elites by 15.0% (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Bane of the trapped
primary: Increase damage against enemies under the effects of control-impairing effects by 15.00%.
secondary: Gain an aura that reduces the movement speed of enemies within 15 yards by 30%. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Boon of the hoarder
primary: 25.0% chance on killing an enemy to cause an explosion of gold.
secondary: Gain 30% increased movement speed for 2 seconds after picking up gold. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Enforcer
primary: Increase the damage of your pets by 15.00%.
secondary: Your pets take 25% less damage. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Esoteric Alteration
secondary: While below half Life, your resistances to Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, and Arcane are increased by 75%. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Gem of ease
secondary: Level requirement of the item this gem is socketed into is set to 1. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Gem of efficacious toxin
primary: Poison all enemies hit for 2000% weapon damage over 10 seconds.
secondary: All enemies you poison take 10% increased damage from all sources. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Gogok of swiftness
primary: 50.0% chance on hit to gain Swiftness, increasing your Attack Speed by 1% for 4 seconds. This effect stacks up to 15 times.
secondary: Gain 1% Cooldown Reduction per stack of Swiftness. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Iceblink
primary: Your Cold skills now apply Chill effects and your Chill effects now Slow enemy movement by an additional 5.0%.
secondary: Gain 10% increased Critical Hit Chance against Chilled and Frozen enemies. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Invigorating gemstone
primary: While under any control-impairing effects, reduce all damage taken by 30.0%.
secondary: Heal for 20% of maximum life when hit by a control-impairing effect. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Mirinae, Teardrop of the Starweaver
primary: 15% chance on hit to smite a nearby enemy for 2000% weapon damage as Holy.
secondary: Smite a nearby enemy every 5 seconds. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Molten Wildebeest's Gizzard
secondary: After not taking damage for 4 seconds, gain an absorb shield for 200% of your total Life per Second. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Moratorium
primary: 25% of all damage taken is instead staggered and dealt to you over 3.00 seconds.
secondary: 10% chance on kill to clear all staggered damage. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Mutilation guard
secondary: While below 30% Life, you may move unhindered through enemies. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Pain enhancer
primary: Critical hits cause the enemy to bleed for 1200.0% weapon damage as Physical over 3 seconds.
secondary: Gain Blood Frenzy, granting you 3% increased Attack Speed for each bleeding enemy within 20 yards. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Simplicity's strength
primary: Increase the damage of primary skills by 25.00%.
secondary: Primary skills heal you for 2% of maximum Life on hit. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Taeguk
primary: Gain 0.5% increased damage for 3 seconds after spending primary resource. This effect stacks up to 20 times.
secondary: Gain 0.5% increased Armor for every stack. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Wreath of lightning
primary: 15% chance on hit to gain a Wreath of Lightning, dealing 600.0% weapon damage as Lightning every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.
secondary: While under the effect of the Wreath of Lightning, gain 25% increased movement speed. (Requires Rank 25)

resources.name: Zei's stone of vengeance
primary: Damage you deal is increased by 4.00% for every 10 yards between you and the enemy hit. Maximum 20.00% increase at 50 yards.
secondary: 20% chance on hit to Stun the enemy for 1 second. (Requires Rank 25)
